PlaceholderBengt: ^If you got any questions for me, go ahead and ask 'em!

c-0: ^I'm a mechanic, first and foremost. A boat mechanic.
^I love all things boats, as you can probably imagine.
^I'd love to work on yours sometime. How about visiting me when the game is fully developed, yeah?
^For now, do you have any more questions for me?
c-1: ^Do you have anything else to ask?
c-2: ^When I'm not busy in my workshop, I love to birdwatch!
^There's no shortage of interesting birds around here.
^Sitting on a bench, binoculars in hand. Listening to them sing... Nothing beats that!
^When you live in a place like this, you've gotta take advantage of how idyllic it is.
^Ah, but I'm getting ahead of myself.
c-3: ^Actually, I do! Could you deliver this package for me?
g-1: ^I'd like you to head just west of here, to Sigrid's island.
^It has a huge lighthouse on it, you can't miss it!
